movi r0, 4
100000 00111 00000 0000000100 000000	
80 E0 01 00

movi r1, 2
100000 00111 00001 0000000010 000000
80 E1 00 80

sw 0(r0), r1
001000 00000 00001 0000000000 000000
20 01 00 00

sw 1(r0), r2
001000 00000 00010 0000000001 000000
20 02 00 40

ld r2, 0(r0)
110000 00000 00010 0000000000 000000
c0 02 00 00

ld r6, 2(r0)
110000 00000 00110 0000000010 000000
c0 06 00 80

mov r0, r1
100000 00001 00000 0000000000 000000
80 20 00 00

movi r5, r2
100000 00010 00101 0000000000 000000
80 45 00 00

addi r1, r0, 1
100000 00000 00001 0000000001 000000
80 01 00 40

addi r2, r1, 1
100000 00001 00010 0000000001 000000
80 22 00 40

jmp 1
000100 00000000000000000000000000
10 00 00 00

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
movi r0, 1		80 E0 00 40
movi r1, 4		80 E1 01 00
movi [r0], r1		20 01 00 00
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
movi r0, 1		80 E0 00 40
addi r1, r0, 1		80 01 00 40
mov r0, r1		80 01 00 00
jmp 0			10 00 00 00
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// 初始化坐标
movi r0, 0		80 E0 00 00	
movi r1, 2		80 E1 00 80
sw 1(r0), r1		20 01 00 40
sw 2(r0), r1		20 01 00 80
ld r6, 2(r0)		c0 06 00 80

// 向右移动一格
ld r1, 1(r0)		c0 01 00 40
addi r2, r1, 1		80 22 00 40
sw 1(r0), r2		20 02 00 40
movi r5, r2		80 45 00 00
jmp 5			10 00 00 05
